title: 😊Lovely Neighborhood with a Peaceful Community😊 Next to Downtown
posting_body: 😍This is located just on the outskirts of downtown.
Have the peace of a neighborhood next to you, while being able to walk to downtown in 9 minutes.
Grocery within short walk, river/trail access minutes away, great cocktail bars, restaurants, breweries nearby within walk.
😊Community offers resort-style pool, 24/7 gym, gated garage parking, rooftop sundeck, 24 hour dry cleaning service, wifi common areas, bike storage center, Green Building and much more.
❤️ Apartment offers patios and balconies, w/d in every unit, wood flooring, high ceilings, and more!
🙌 Is this close to what you're looking for, but not quite it?
